title: All-Star Icon Bug?
body:
I've been noticing something that I think might be a bug and I hope a Riot employee will see this. Ever since I bought the Team Fire icon and have had it up as my icon every time I kill an enemy there is a burst of fire. Now that isn't what I want to bring to light, because I know that's supposed to happen. However I don't think this part is: while the death timer is ticking for the enemy I killed for some reason a still image appears a few seconds after at the spot I killed them. And everyone else can see it too. It hasn't happened randomly, it happens every time the finisher goes off.
I'm not sure if it happens with the Team Ice icon or not since I only bought the Fire icon.

replies.body:
Hey ChaosBlaze, 

Is [this](https://youtu.be/6LcmzqSChvY?t=19s) what you're seeing?

Well the finishers have been disabled so I hope it appears the bug I was talking about is being fixed. In question to the video you posted, the burst of fire and the block of ice I know are supposed to happen(I have yet to figure out how to get the icon to pop up over my champion's head).
Looks like we had an issue with this where the finishers were disabled. They should be back up and running now. As for the emote, it's ctrl+ 6!

Are the finishers / icons permanent? I want to buy them, but I also dont' want them to go away after the tournament is over :(
The icon is yours if you buy it, however the finisher will be removed. They did the same thing with the heart and lightning bolt finishers they had earlier this year, I still have my heart icon.
The icons are permanently yours to keep, but you'll lose the finishers and the emote. This is similar to how we've done these types of icons in the past.
